definition[0]: a situation in which someone is injured or killed by a gun
example[0]: His brother was killed in a shooting incident last year.
example[1]: the accidental shooting of a child
definition[1]: the sport of shooting animals and birds with guns
example[3]: The shooting party set off shortly before dawn.
definition[2]: the process of taking photographs or making a film
example[4]: We had two weeks of rehearsals before shooting began.
